Release Notes:
What's New:
  • Functionality to add/edit/remove a company.
  • Functionality to select a company on the user profile form.
  • Functionality to ingest/display Truck Certification, Recertification, and Decertification information
  • Functionality to flag a truck for recertification/decertification.
  • Functionality to ingest/display Load Ticket information. Send email to Contractor POC and view email history in DRS.
  • Functionality to add/update Project Execution Contractors and Company information
  • Functionality to add/update Temporary and Final Disposal Sites
  • Functionality to schedule First Day Inspections
  • Functionality to ingest/display First Day Inspection information
  • Functionality to schedule Every Day Inspections
  • Functionality to ingest/display Every Day Inspection information
  • Functionality to schedule an FOO to First and Every Day Inspections
  • Functionality to Edit/Pause/Resume/Reassign/Cancel work.
  • Functionality to ingest/display Damage Report information
  • Functionality to ingest/display Incident Issue information
  • Functionality to notify BO of incident report.
  • Functionality to validate Incident Report.
  • Functionality to escalate Incident Report to BOM
  • Functionality to send No Pay notification emails to BO
  • Functionality to record Damage Report History Log
  • Functionality to record Truck Certification History Log
  • Functionality to record Load Ticket History Log
  • Functionality to ingest/display Damage Release documentation
  • Functionality to send Damage Release notification emails to BO
  • Functionality to send Hot Issues notification emails to BO
  • Functionality update to document when home owner opt out of the program.
  • Functionality update for BOM, Resource Coordinator, COR3 Approver, Document Specialist, and Document QA/QC user roles to generate/view Inspection PDFs.
  • Functionality update to consolidate all documentation Inspection related documentation at the Site Profile.
Bug Fixes
  • Update to allow DRS to retry and import files related to a Inspection multiple times if it fails.
  • Update to ensure active Rates are being updated accordingly in the SOW.
  • Update to ensure Site ID 63-06542 SOW Rates are calculated correctly

What's New
  • Training Center update to publish PW Justification visual aid in English and Spanish in the FEMA PA training module
  • Training Center update to publish new video tutorials for Benefit Cost Analysis in the HMGP Training Module
  • Training Center update to present September training events in the FEMA PA and HMGP training module calendar

Bug Fix
  • Updates to allow the user to select any DRS Applicant in the search when setting up a new HMGP project.
